name: Avocado Kefir Smoothie with Ginger and Mint
description: This take on a green smoothie is buttery and delicious thanks to ripe avocado.
recipeIngredient: Flesh from one ripe Hass avocado, about 2/3 cup
1 teaspoon peeled, roughly chopped fresh ginger

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend on high until smooth, about 1 minute. Pour into two glasses and serve immediately.
